e="preserve">A local community is a group of people living in a same location. The group has common and shared values. The groups are larger than a household.
The word "community" is comes from the Old French word "communité". This came from the Latin word "communitas" (cum, "with/together" + munus, "gift"), a broad term for fellowship or organized society.
A sense of community refers to the way people see the connections within the group, shared responsibility, and common goals.
